entry.title: Ukraine and Russia Prepare for Talks in Turkey as Russian Missiles Hit Cities
entry.content: Negotiators were scheduled to travel to Istanbul for face-to-face cease-fire talks after Moscow’s forces struck sites across Ukraine overnight.

entry.title: Putin's War in Ukraine Tests Allegiances of Latvia's Russian Speakers
entry.content: A large minority in the country looked to Moscow after the Cold War. Some are now reassessing their allegiance, but not all.

entry.title: Pakistan's Imran Khan Puts Up Fierce Fight to Stay in Power
entry.content: The prime minister and former cricket star faces a no-confidence vote in parliament, as the country’s powerful military, which aided his rise to power, has turned cold on him.
